questions.question: 1. For the structure considered in this experiment, a column is part of how many frames?

explanations.a: In this experiment a column is part of 2 frames

questions.question: 2. What is the load path in the considered structure?

explanations.a: In the considered structure load path is (Slab → Beam → Column → Footing)

questions.question: 3. The value of zone factor (z) considered for zone IV is _______ .

explanations.c: The value of zone factor (z) considered for zone IV is 0.36

questions.question: 4. How is the self weight of the columns and walls lumped to the floors

answers.a: Equally divided among the floors containing the column element

explanations.a: The self weight is equally divided among the floors containing the column element
